    select

```{r}
idata <- iris %>% 
  arrange(desc(Sepal.Length)) %>% 
  mutate(
    ratio = Sepal.Width/Sepal.Length,
  ) %>% 
  select(Species, ratio) %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(
    sd_ratio =. sd(ratio),
    mean_ratio = mean(ratio)
  )
  

idata
```
